p: All EOs were tested for their repellent activity against Ae. albopictus by numbering the mosquito landings on the uncovered area of the glove for 5 min [ 17]. The results of the bioassays are present in Table 2. PPI showed important repellent activity, presenting approximately 82% repellency at a dose of 0.2 Î¼L/cm 2. On the other hand, the JTU, PNI, PHE and JOX essential oils presented moderate or low repellent activity against the Asian tiger mosquito.
